data.text: @NeoUnrealist @TODAYshow If you have a guy that no one wants to fire, he's going to throw his weight around. He will treat people around him like shit in all conceivable ways. So yeah, sometimes you just have to cut such a person loose, no matter how much money they brought in years before.

@NeoUnrealist @TODAYshow Yeah. I mean, I am also afraid of a witch hunt, and I don't want innocent people ruined. But it seems like most of the time, a) the allegations aren't new, and b) these guys usually admit it. When people aren't held accountable, they fall to expectations.
